text: Am I correct in assuming that if you add a 1% (of sp matched) lay SP bet  the price will increase by 1% and vice versa for back SP bets?

text:
Just seen this and noticed the comment
```event_type_ids=["7"], # was 7 for horses, 4339 for greyhounds, 15 = todays card greyhounds```
I don't get 15 as a returned code form listEventTypes - is this legit as a code? If so how did you come by it and is there an equivalent for today's card horses?

elements.text: Just seen this and noticed the comment
event_type_ids=["7"], # was 7 for horses, 4339 for greyhounds, 15 = todays card greyhounds

text:
I have some stuff written in C# too DC and I saw it written in the comments there when I was searching for the greyhounds event type id. I have only been using 4339 so sorry not sure if 15 is still valid?
Ill have a look to see what Ican find although maybe out of date?
